reviews.review: Brings me on step closer to suicide.

Full of hackers, Valve is doing absolutely nothing about it. Pathetically relying on players reporting and doing over-watch themselves. DO NOT START PLAYING THIS GAME! You'll get addicted and then you'll have a toxic relationship with the game.
Best Game Ever For Serious Players
amk oyunuvac ban attı gerçek hilecileri banlamayın bizi banlayın gaben anneni götten kralını kökten
çalış valve çalış hilecileri durduk artık
игра мусор у меня сын умер от игры этой я роот ебал бля
Лаик, игра супир, кагда стриляешь в упор в противника а попадаишь в себя
Very nice game, very well developed and only for dedicated players. Sometimes i get tilted a lot, but this is one of the best games ever. And it's also the best esport
Buen competitivo, completamente recomendado. A pesar de ello a veces algunos compañeros pueden llegar a fastidiarte la partida, o algún jacker. Perfecto para un grupo de 5 amigos.
Great game... If you can rework ranked system?
Заходишь поиграть на прайме, а тебя в голову убивают
Fun for both casual and competitive play
Прекрасная игра, очко горит, спасибо за внимание
Just love this game, and you will too <3
ПИЗДАТАЯ, НО ЖОПА  ГОРИТ НЕ ПЛОХА
Oyuna Para Verip Seçkin Olmanıza Rağmen 10 Rekabetçi Maçın )'unda Hile geliyor Oyundan Zerre zevk almıyorsunuz emeği geçenlerin Başarılarının Devamını Sikeyim
Sin duda el mejor juego que he probado

CS:GO was a fun game to 100 % and its entirely doable being f2p as well. I bought this game back then expecting to play it a lot but never really captivated me.

I guess I just suck at shooters.

Still I mostly enjoyed around 60% of the additional 40 hours I put into this game and I'm happy to announce that I'm never touching it again!
Have fun newbies!

Κλασικά οι περισσότεροι γνωρίζετε όλοι το CS GO , είναι πολύ ωραίο το παιχνίδι ειδικά τώρα που είναι δωρεάν!
Δυστυχώς εγώ το αγόρασα κανονικά...
Αν έχετε φίλους μπείτε μαζί είναι είναι πάρα πολύ καλό!
Hileleri düzeltsenize anası dûrdane orospu evlatları

Хорошая игра. Играл много. В целом интересная аркада, веселые режимы маньяк, пряткки, опен кейсы, семченко кирилл. Недавна добавили возможность покупать оружие. Стало еще интереснее. Но скучно летать по пустой карте в соревновательных.
This is a good game about shooting people.
Hileler Ve Düşük Yaş Kitlesi Olmasa Zevkli Bir Oyun
It is a fun game but i recomend prime becuas there are a lot of hackers/Cheaters in non prime but overall a good and fun game
el mejor modo competitivo que hay
